channel.title: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?
channel.description: So far I have only maxed out my wc. what are other easy skills? I'm just wonderig what skill should I max next for my trimmed skill cape.

item.title: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Construction costs about 100-120m on oak planks (Oak dungeon doors) for 99 alone. Herblore costs probably more then that.

@OP

Cooking / Fletching / Firemaking are known as the ‘cape-trimmers’, so if you want an easy 99, go with that.

Read full topic
item.source: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?

item.title: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Easiest and fastest would be construction and herblore, but both cost an easy 25m+ to get to 99.

Read full topic
item.source: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?

item.title: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?
item.dc:creator: @cumescape cumescape
item.description:
@cumescape wrote:

Woodcut and Firemake, they work for them selfs - what I mean by that is Woodcut pays for Firemake with the logs, and your set.

Read full topic
item.source: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?

item.title: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:255601”][quote author=chassy13 link=topic=337737.msg2623076#msg2623076 date=1231603961]
Prayer is really easy if you have the money.
[/quote]
Quite a few skills are easy if you have the money. For example smithing you can just buy the best bars that you can smith with (adamant, rune).
Fletching, cooking are just the cheapest.[/quote]

Well, it all depends on what method you use to get the 99. Using sharks instead of monkfish to 99 cooking will cost most than using monkfish until 99 like I did.

Fletching you usually make a bit of profit too, so if you don’t have 99 fletching…then that would probably be a decent 99 if you want a tiny profit.

Read full topic
item.source: [?]What are the easiest skills to max?

Fletching, cooking are just the cheapest.

Prayer is really easy if you have the money.
